title: Phantom Cruise Ship

background.natural_environment: A phantom cruise ship suddenly appears in the Pacific Ocean, where all electronic equipment malfunctions
background.historical_context: This ship disappeared in a mysterious case 20 years ago

longgoal: To uncover the truth behind the reappearance of the cruise ship and find a way to escape within 7 days

characters.name: Lin Xiu
characters.personality: Skilled in psychological manipulation, always wears a glove on the left hand
characters.health_status: Heterochromia (left eye golden, right eye brown)

characters.name: Chen Xiaodao
characters.personality: Seems timid but actually has amazing powers of observation

relationships.type: Debt relationship (Lin Xiu owes Su Mingyue a huge medical bill)
Professional aversion (Su Mingyue dislikes gambling addicts)
Exploitative relationship (Lin Xiu knows Chen Xiaodao's true identity)
Fear and respect (Chen Xiaodao has seen Lin Xiu cheat and kill)
Doctor-patient relationship (once performed an emergency surgery on Chen Xiaodao)
Gratitude (Chen Xiaodao secretly protects Su Mingyue)
